description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Learn how to make "Philadelphia-style" ice-cream with an easy Orange- Buttermilk version complete with dark chocolate sauce. With a few basic ingredients, and a concise lesson in flavour components, texture and terminology, the viewer is taught to create a unique Individual Baked Alaska and Sparkling Sorbet with Strawberry Sauce.
